biotools.summary: Genomic data analyses requires integrated visualization of known genomic information and new experimental data. This tool uses the biomaRt package to perform live annotation queries to Ensembl and translates this to e.g. gene/transcript structures in viewports of the grid graphics package. Genomic information is plotted together with your data. Plot different data types such as array CGH, gene expression, sequencing and other data, together in one plot using the same genome coordinate system.
